DOC.brief_summary: Slow release iron capsules containing ferrous sulfate have been designed based on the gastric delivery system. Iron absorption from those capsules administered with and without meals will be measured using stable iron isotopes.
DOC.brief_title: Iron Absorption From GDS Capsules II
